LanguageData.MURUVWallLight_LightRadDesc: The range that will be considered brightly lit and allow plants to grow. Valid Range: 2 - 10. Default: 5
LanguageData.MURUVWallLight_SteelCostDesc: How much steel a single light costs to build. Default: 10
LanguageData.MURUVWallLight_PowerCostDesc: How much power a single light consumes while active. Default: 600
LanguageData.MURUVWallLight_DisableRestDesc: If enabled the light will not turn off for the default plant resting period.
LanguageData.MURUVWallLight_WhiteModeDesc: Replaces the cool purple color with a bland white color.
LanguageData.MURUVWallLight_WarningNeedWall: Must be placed over a wall.
LanguageData.MURUVWallLight_WarningBlocked: Must be facing a passable tile.
LanguageData.MURUVWallLight_WarningBoth: Must be placed over a wall, facing a passable tile.
LanguageData.MURUVWallLight_RadiusInvalidRange: Invalid radius. Brightly Lit Radius valid range 2 to 10. Changed to nearest valid value.
LanguageData.MURUVWallLight_AlertReload: Please save and load the game for changes to take effect.
LanguageData.MURUVWallLight_DestroyedWall: Grow Light destroyed by wall destruction.
